channel.title: Project Insanity Automaticially Teleport
channel.description:
Hey Guys,
I'm looking at this new feature I've thought of that is unique. I don't think anyone hasd thought about it but I need help adding it. Basically what i want to do if check if a player is in an area (I know how to do that) and if they are not a staffmember to be teleported to a specific place. I know how to make it check if a player is in somewhere but how do i make it teleport out if they are in there. Like where should I add the command to I'm not sure and I'm confused.
Thanks,
[b]SacredHeart[/b]

item.title: Project Insanity Automaticially Teleport
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

specifiedY would be the Y coordinate of the location you choose

Read full topic

item.title: Project Insanity Automaticially Teleport
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

[quote=“Cres, post:3, topic:406801”]You have to add this in either the GameTick (Client.java) which is not suggested.
Or you can make it check in the walking method…

If (newX == specifiedX && newY == specifiedY) { Telemyass(); } [/quote]
Whats the difference with SpecifiedY and newY?

Read full topic

item.title: Project Insanity Automaticially Teleport
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

You have to add this in either the GameTick (Client.java) which is not suggested.
Or you can make it check in the walking method…

If (newX == specifiedX && newY == specifiedY) {
   Telemyass();
}

Read full topic

item.title: Project Insanity Automaticially Teleport
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

it would be like funpk,
public boolean isinstaffplace(){
if (absx >= #### && absy >= #### && absx =< #### && absy =< ####){
return true;
} else{
return false;
}
}

and then under process()
if c.isinstaffplace{
tox = ####;
toy = ####;
}

this might require slight modification im just giving you the general idea

Read full topic
